mapper.insert: insert into stock (product_idx, size, count) values (#{product_idx}, #{size}, #{count})
mapper.update: UPDATE stock AS a SET COUNT = (SELECT c.COUNT FROM (SELECT b.COUNT FROM stock AS b WHERE b.product_idx = #{product_idx} AND b.size = #{size}) AS c) + #{add} WHERE a.product_idx = #{product_idx} AND a.size = #{size}
mapper.delete: delete from stock where product_idx=#{product_idx} and size=#{size}
mapper.select: select count from stock where product_idx=#{product_idx} and size=#{size}
